page.title: 20Farm Visit
page.content: In our area most farmers{farm}on a { part time}basis.Some have some cows & sheep etc. but also have a job.I went to a farm called{Pasture House.}The farmer bred prize{bulls}as a full time living.We went on the moors in his landrover to see his prize Charolais cows.They were pure white there were cows & calves.Then he took us back down the moors to the farm.It was a bumpy ride and I got squashed but I put up with it.When we got back to the farm the farmer showed us two{Jersey} cows.They were different shades of brown,dark brown & light brown.One was called Nelly and the other was called Nora.Then we went to see some calves.We had a chance to feed the calves.It was fun. We went to see a new born Charolais calf which we named{Adele.
